description: Pinetek Networks is set to launch the IOL HAT on Crowdsupply soon, a versatile solution designed for integrating industrial sensors into single-board computer-based projects, such as the Raspberry Pi. This device facilitates data exchange with smart SDCI sensors and actuators, adhering to the IEC 61131-9 standards, commonly referred to as IO-Link. There will be two […]
title: IOL HAT: Enhancing Smart Sensor Integration for Raspberry Pi and Industrial Applications.
